content: The activation instructions will be sent to the specified email address.

comment.text: The "EmailActivationDescription" translation key is used to display instructions about activation via email. It appears in a modal dialog when prompting users to change their email address, and its purpose is to inform them that activation details will be sent to their specified email address.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Aktivləşdirmə təlimatları daxil edilmiş elektron poçta göndəriləcək' is not a direct and accurate translation of 'The activation instructions will be sent to the specified email address.'. 'Daxil edilmiş' implies 'entered' or 'included', which isn't the intended meaning. It suggests the email instructions are part of the email being sent, rather than being sent *to* the specified email address.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aktivləşdirmə təlimatları göstərilən elektron poçt ünvanına göndəriləcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Инструкциите за активация ще бъдат изпратени на въведения имейл" doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'specified email address'. 'Въведения имейл' translates to 'entered email' which isn't as precise. It implies the email was just entered, rather than the designated, intended email.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Инструкциите за активация ще бъдат изпратени на посочения имейл адрес.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Οι οδηγίες ενεργοποίησης θα αποσταλούν στο email που καταχωρίσατε' is a functional translation, but not an ideal one for this context. 'Καταχωρίσατε' implies the user actively entered the email. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'στο email διεύθυνση που δώσατε' (to the email address you provided) or 'στο email που έχετε δώσει' (to the email you have given).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Οι οδηγίες ενεργοποίησης θα αποσταλούν στο email διεύθυνση που δώσατε.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Las instrucciones de activación se enviarán al email introducido' doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'specified email address.' 'Introducido' implies the user entered it, which isn't necessarily the case. A more accurate translation would reflect the email is designated or chosen.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Las instrucciones de activación se enviarán a la dirección de correo electrónico proporcionada.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Aktivointiohjeet lähetetään syötettyyn sähköpostiosoitteeseen" is somewhat literal and could be improved for naturalness. While technically correct, it doesn't flow as naturally as other options in Finnish.
Trailing period at the end of the sentence is unnecessary and impacts readability in Japanese. Japanese sentences often end with a slightly more natural, less formal closure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 入力されたメールにアクティベーションの手順が送られてきます

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '활성화 방법이 입력하신 이메일로 전송됩니다' is a literal translation that might sound slightly awkward in Korean. A more natural phrasing would be something like '활성화 안내가 입력하신 이메일 주소로 발송됩니다' or '입력하신 이메일 주소로 활성화 안내가 발송됩니다'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 활성화 안내가 입력하신 이메일 주소로 발송됩니다

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ຄຳແນະນຳກ່ຽວກັບການເປີດໃຊ້ງານຈະຖືກສົ່ງໄປທີ່ອີເມວທີ່ປ້ອນເຂົ້າ' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English sentence. 'ປ້ອນເຂົ້າ' implies the email was entered, which isn't necessarily the case.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄຳແນະນຳກ່ຽວກັບການຢັ້ງຢືນຕົວຕົນຈະຖືກສົ່ງໄປທີ່ອີເມວທີ່ທ່ານກໍານົດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Aktivizācijas norādījumi tiks nosūtīti uz ievadīto e-pastu' is not a precise equivalent to 'The activation instructions will be sent to the specified email address.'. 'Ievadīto' (entered) implies the user entered the email address, which isn't explicitly stated in the English original.  It changes the meaning slightly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aktivizācijas instrukcijas tiks nosūtītas uz norādīto e-pasta adresi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb conjugation 'será' (will be) doesn't agree with the subject 'instruções' (instructions), which is plural. It should be 'serão'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: As instruções de ativação serão enviadas para o e-mail digitado.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'සක්‍රියන උපදෙස් අදාළ වි-තැපැල් ලිපිනයට යවනු ලැබේ' is a literal translation and sounds slightly unnatural in Sinhala. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing would improve clarity and user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'ඔබේ වි-තැපැල් ලිපිනයට දැනුම්දීමක් යවනු ලැබේ' (A notification will be sent to your email address).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'specified email address' is not accurately reflected in the Slovenian translation 'vneseni e-mail naslov'. 'Specified' implies a deliberate choice or designated address, while 'vneseni' implies simply 'entered'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Navodila za aktivacijo bodo poslana na izbrani e-mail naslov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The character 'ц́е' appears to be an unusual rendering. It seems to be a combination of 'ће' (will) with an unusual diacritic. This is likely a display/encoding issue.

The Vietnamese translation 'Hướng dẫn kích hoạt sẽ được gửi đến email đã nhập' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural. 'Email đã nhập' (email entered) implies the user input the email, which is implied by the context. A more natural phrasing would convey the instruction is related to the provided/specified email.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hướng dẫn kích hoạt sẽ được gửi đến địa chỉ email bạn đã cung cấp.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '激活说明将发送至输入的邮箱' is not a perfect match for the English content 'The activation instructions will be sent to the specified email address.' While generally understandable, '输入的邮箱' (the entered email address) implies the user input the address, whereas the English indicates it's the intended recipient's email.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 激活说明将发送至您指定的邮箱地址 (Jihuo shuoming jiang fasong zhi nin queding de youxiang dizhi)
